components.description:
A guide (or Seeing Eye) dog, trained to help lead a person who is blind or visually impaired. Generally depicted as a yellowish-brown Labrador Retriever on all fours facing left, equipped with a harness and handle. Many platforms additionally include a collar.

Not to be confused with üêï‍ü¶∫ Service Dog, though their popular applications may overlap.

Twitter implements the same dog as its üêï Dog. Samsung and Twitter’s guide dogs have green harnesses.

version.description: Unicode 12.0 was released on March 5, 2019. Emojis that require new code points for release are listed on this page. See Emoji 12.0 for the full 2019 emoji list. More about this update.
